mapper.sql: id, name, param_key, param_value, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks
mapper.update:
update sys_param
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
param_key = #{paramKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
param_value = #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${dsf}

update sys_param set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_key = #{paramKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, param_value = #{paramValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${dsf}
